description:
Comfy, quick drying shorts for beach days, pool parties (they’re not just for kids), and warm weather exploring. If you have been looking for loose cut shorts to pair with your new favourite sandals, then the Surfs Up shorts are here for it.

  • Light recycled polyester blend dries quickly and has a comfortable stretch
  • DWR finish helps these shorts shake off water, or spilt mimosas
  • Dual hand pockets and a secure zippered back pocket
  • Mesh lined pockets breathe well and drain quickly
  • High waist is elasticised and has a drawcord, making it easy to find your perfect fit
  • Relaxed fit has a casual comfort
name: alder Surfs Up Shorts - Women's
